titleStmt.title: Contemplative pictures with wholesome precepts. The first part: Of God. Of the diuell. Of goodnesse. Of badnesse. Of heauen: and of hell. By Richard Bernard.
titleStmt.author: Bernard, Richard, 1568-1641.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Hall for William Welbie, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Svvan,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Emmanuel College Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Svvan
